remarks: The sum of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumadd.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumadd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumadd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumadd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumadd.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
gsumadd.fn $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumadd.hn $e |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumadd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
